name: Golang Developer
description:
Due to the active development of the project to ensure security and protection against fraud in the telecommunications industry, we are looking for a Go-developer to join the team.
We are developing a distributed high-load real-time system. The main requirements for the product are high efficiency and productivity. We do not limit ourselves in the choice of technologies and find the optimal solution for each task.

Tasks will include the development and support of:

  • Distributed highly loaded services (agents) that implement p2p interaction;
  • Coordinating system;
  • HTTP/GRPC API for web UI, user portal and external integrations
  • Internal system for automatic testing of all infrastructure elements;
  • Various auxiliary utilities.

Requirements:

  • Good knowledge of the Golang programming language, experience with a profiler is desirable;
  • Fluency in SQL, working with Postgresql;
  • Experience with SSL/TLS and certificates (openssl);
  • Understanding the principles of the network (ip, tcp, udp, http);
  • Understanding the principles of RPC, experience with GRPC (and protobuf, respectively) is desirable;
  • Ability to work independently;
  • Technical English.

It is desirable to have experience in the field of telecommunications: a basic understanding of the basic elements and principles of operation of mobile networks and the SIP protocol.

We offer:

  • Flexible work schedule (including the possibility of remote work);
  • Support for professional development (payment for participation in training conferences, webinars);
  • Sports activities: football, volleyball, table tennis, kicker;
  • Exciting corporate events;
  • Streamlining strategy, democratic environment, life - balance work culture;
  • Highly qualified management always at your disposal.
